description:
Visit my Amazon affiliated links to pick up supplies for this craft:
Massage Roller: https://amzn.to/2jK5Vte
Scotty’s favorite glue gun: http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV
Surebonder Gluesticks: https://amzn.to/2I9hZPn

For more information on DM crafting visit my website:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

This simple technique can easily add stone texture to all your terrain for your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project won’t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

Get cheap crafting stuff at the Dollar Tree (My affiliated link): http://www.shareasale.com/u.cfm?d=434929&m=64888&u=1701826

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Super Easy Stone Texture on Styrofoam (DM's Craft/Short Tip #107)
